properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 5 at 3:19PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and
seas 15 to 20 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Thursday to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
